attrs.script:
import requests
from requests.auth import HTTPBasicAuth

auth = HTTPBasicAuth('admin', 'infoblox')
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
url = 'https://10.68.97.38/wapi/v2.7/network'
response = requests.get(url, verify=False, headers=headers, auth=auth)

sieci = json.loads(response.text)



network_list = []
y = 0
while len(sieci) > y:
    pierwszy_address = sieci[y]
    for x in pierwszy_address:
        if x == "network":
            network_list.append(pierwszy_address["network"])
    y += 1
print(",".join(network_list))

attrs.script:
import requests
from requests.auth import HTTPBasicAuth

auth = HTTPBasicAuth('admin', 'infoblox')
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
url = 'https://10.68.97.38/wapi/v2.7/network'
response = requests.get(url, verify=False, headers=headers, auth=auth)

sieci = json.loads(response.text)



network_list = []
y = 0
while len(sieci) > y:
    pierwszy_address = sieci[y]
    for x in pierwszy_address:
        if x == "network":
            network_list.append(pierwszy_address["network"])
    y += 1
print(",".join(network_list))
